transcript:
Executive: Ji sir bataye.
Customer: Hello. 
Customer: Mujhe laptop pe IndiaMART ka app download karna hai.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ka app sir mobile se hi hota hai sir laptop me seller.indiamart.com sir use hota hai sir.
Customer: Kaise karna hai?
Executive: Aap sir usme seller.indiamart.com search kariye.
Customer: Mai udhar se dekh sakta hai na mera abhi jaisa mobile pe dekh raha hu. Waisa wo dikhega kya mera account?
Executive: Ji aap mai aapko kahu aapko video me link link bhej deta hu thik hai aap usko join kar lijiye baki mai karwa deta hu aapko.
Executive: Send karu aapko link?
Customer: Kaunsa link share karoge?
Executive: Google Meet aapko send karta hu Google Meet link thik hai usko aap join kar lijiye screen share karke mai aapko bata deta hu kaise karta hu.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai. Aap line pe bane rahe sir line pe bane rahe sir ek minute.
(silence)
Executive: Ji sir mail check kare sir mail pe gaya hoga.
Customer: Mail pe gaya kya?
Executive: Ji.
(silence)
Executive: Desktop me join kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Desktop se join kar rahe hai na?
Customer: Abhi mai mobile se hi join karunga. 
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir join kare sir.
(silence)
Executive: Join ho gaya?
Executive: Ji sir join kar liya aapne?
Customer: Wait wait sir.
(silence)
Customer: Ho gaya kya?
Executive: Wait wait sir.
(silence)
Executive: Ji sir.
Executive: Aapke laptop se join kiye na aap? Mobile phone se join kiye? Hello.
Customer: Kya karu?
Executive: Mai keh raha hu aapko laptop me login karna hai na aapko?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Okay aapne laptop se join kiya na?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi mobile se join kiya hai. Abhi mobile se join kiya hai aap laptop se join sir koi nahi mai batata hu.
(silence)
Executive: Meri screen aapko visible hai?
Customer: Ha dikh raha hai.
Executive: Mai jaise search kar raha hu waise hi search kariye laptop me.
Executive: Seller.indiamart.com
Executive: Ji seller hai kya seller?
Executive: Ji seller hai S E double L E R IndiaMART. IndiaMART ha. .com search kar liya aapne?
Customer: Ha search kar liya.
Executive: Okay ab isko search karenge aisa dashboard aayega sir aapka. 
Customer: Ha aa gaya.
Executive: Aa gaya aapko?
Customer: Ha aa gaya idhar mobile number puch raha hai. 
Executive: Ha to aap apna primary mobile number isme daliye. Yaha pe jaake login karenge. Jo aapka primary number isme add hai. Thik hai jaise IndiaMART ka app puch raha hai ha usko number aap fill kariye.
Customer: Achha. Isme aa jayega kya fir number? 
Executive: Ha ha ha. Number daal ke OTP daliye.
(silence)
Customer: Ha sir aa gaya. 
Executive: OTP aapne kar diya? 
Customer: Ye diya hai chalu ho gaya wo.
Executive: Ye chalu ho gaya aapka? Login aa gaya.
Customer: Ek minute sir.
(silence)
Executive: Ho gaya sir ek minute. Sir aapke taraf se ek ticket open ho gayi incoming call ki thik hai mai ticket close kar raha hu abhi. Thik hai sir? 
Customer: Ha karo karo karo karo. 
Executive: To sir aapke WhatsApp pe na ek message jayegi primary number pe thik hai. To feedback ka message jayega to sir feedback share kar dijiye sir thik hai sir? 
Customer: Thik hai. 
Executive: Agar aapko koi bhi issue ho to bata sakte hai ki matlab hamare taraf se koi hum usko solve kar sakte hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Sir aapka catalog score sir down ho gaya sir aapka 68.7% ho gaya hai sir aapka.
Customer: Kya ho gaya?
Executive: Catalog score sir mai aapko dikhata hu sir ek minute.
(silence)
Executive: Ye aapko jo dikh raha hai na catalog score 68 point ye red dikh raha hai aapka catalog score. 
Customer: Ha ha thik hai. 
Executive: Is sir isme bata dete hai to mai iska catalog score sahi kar de raha hu ek minute.
Customer: Wo do teen do teen catalog score lagane ka hai baad me laga dunga mai usko.
Executive: Achha usme kuch aur add karna hai kya usme?
Customer: Ha karta hu mai baad me add karta hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap wo nahi keh raha bas mujhe bata dijiye mai sahi kar de raha hu thik hai.
(silence)
Executive: Isme photo photo sir aapke paas hoga na sir photo?
Customer: Wo mai karta hu wo mujhe malum hai karna kaise hai. 
Executive: Achha ye kar denge aap photo add?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi kaisa hai mujhe khali wo laptop pe kaise open hota hai dekhna tha. 
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji. Wo baki ka mai baad me kar dunga kyuki abhi mujhe aur karna hai.
Executive: Achha achha okay sir koi dikkat nahi baki sir aapko sab kuch sahi hai na buyleads wagera sab kuch sahi aa rahi hai sir aapko? 
Customer: Ha sahi aa raha hai sahi aa raha hai. 
Executive: Okay sir business wagera achha mil raha hai sir aapko? 
Customer: Thik hai thik hai achha mil raha hai. 
Executive: Ji bilkul okay sir mujhe wo feedback share kar dijiyega thik hai? 
Customer: Ha de do de do. 
Executive: Mai wo mai aapko WhatsApp pe hi likh ke bhej deta hu sir. 
Customer: Thik hai thik hai wo link bhi bhej do kaise kya karna hai. 
Executive: Ha mai ticket close karke abhi aapke paas mail pe bhi jayega WhatsApp pe bhi jayega to sir feedback share kar dijiyega thik hai sir? 
Customer: Thik hai WhatsApp pe bhej do mai karta hu turant karta hu. 
Executive: Okay sir okay thank you sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to download IndiaMART app on laptop.

- Customer needs assistance with logging in.

- Catalog score is down.



Resolution:

- Informed that the app is only for mobile.

- Provided the website link for laptop use.

- Sent Google Meet link for screen sharing.

- Explained how to log in via the website.

- Offered to correct the catalog score.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share feedback on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- app, laptop, login, catalog score, feedback
